title: Planet Zak! Good to Go Paul Frank Snack and Sip Canteen with Removable Ice Pack, 15-Ounce Beverage Holder, 5-Ounce Snack Holder
features: Removable ice pack features -inchcold hold-inch technology

description: Planet Zak's Paul Frank Snack and Sip Canteen has a 15oz beverage container with removable ice pack and a 5oz twist-off container base to store snacks. It is part of the Good To Go collection of child safe mealtime products from Planet Zak. Since 1976, Planet Zak has been committed to making mealtime fun for people around the world.
